newsitem.title: USA: U.S. high-yield corporate bond forward calendar.
newsitem.headline: U.S. high-yield corporate bond forward calendar.

text.p: The following lists of
high-yield bond offerings, which were gathered from market
sources, are provided below:
*HIGH-YIELD BOND OFFERINGS EXPECTED WEEK OF 6/9/97:
*HIGH-YIELD BOND OFFERINGS EXPECTED IN THE NEAR FUTURE
*HIGH YIELD BOND OFFERINGS PRICED RECENTLY
*HIGH-YIELD BOND OFFERINGS POSTPONED
HIGH-YIELD BOND OFFERINGS EXPECTED WEEK OF 6/9/97:
*AZTECA HOLDINGS $255 million 144a snr sec notes due 02
3yr prefunded +175 to +200 bps over Azteca 10.125s due 04 BS
*CHASE TELECOMMUNICATIONS $125 million 144a sr disc notes due 04 14%
with 15% to 17% warrants CSFB
*DI GIORGIO CORP (WHITE ROSE) $140 million 144a sr nts due 07 10% to
*GREATER BEIJING FIRST EXPRESSWAYS LTD $100 million sr unsec nts due
04 BA1/BB 1yr prefunded MS
*GREATER BEIJING FIRST EXPRESSWAYS LTD $175 million sr unsec nts due
07 BA1/BB 1yr prefunded MS
*NORTH ATLANTIC TRADING CO INC $115 144a sr notes due 04
*PACALTA RESOURCES LTD $100 million 144a sr unsec notes due 04 DLJ
*RIDDELL SPORTS INC $100 million 144a sr notes due 07 10.625% NCMI
*STANDARD PACIFIC $100 million sr notes due 07 BA2/BB SAL
*VERIO INC $150 million 144a sr notes due 04 2.5 yr overfunded 13% to
13.25% with 3% warrants ML
